00038 require_once("../../include.inc.php");
00039 
00040 if ($_GET['del']) {
00041   $dbw = sqlite_open($database);
00042   sqlite_query("delete from pfhosts where id='". sqlite_escape_string($_GET['del']). "'", $dbw);
00043   sqlite_close($dbw);
00044 #  reload();
00045 }
00046 
00047 $db = sqlite_popen($database);
00048 $results = sqlite_query("select * from pfhosts", $db);
00049 unset($pfhosts);
00050 while ($row = sqlite_fetch_array($results, SQLITE_ASSOC)) {
00051   $pfhosts[] = $row;
00052 }
00053 sqlite_close($db);
00054 
00055 $active = "pfw";
00056 $style = <<<EOS
00057 
00058 th {padding: 0 2em; }
00059 
00060 EOS;
00061 page_header("pfw config");
00062 
00063 ?>
00064 <div>
00065 <h2>Hosts</h2>
00066 
00067 <table style="width: auto; margin: 1em 0 0.5em 0;">
00068 <thead>
00069     <tr>
00070     <th>Name</th>
00071     <th>Connection</th>
00072     <th>Can Connect</th>
00073     <th>Master</th>
00074   </tr>
00075 </thead>
00076 <tbody>
00077 
00078 <?php foreach ($pfhosts as $pfhost) { ?>
00079   <tr>
00080     <td><?php print  $pfhost[name];?></td>
00081     <td><?php print  $pfhost[connect];?></td>
00082     <td><?php print  ($pfhost[can_connect] == "true" ? "Y": "") ?></td>
00083     <td><?php print  $pfhost[master];?></td>
00084 
00085     <td class="edit" nowrap="nowrap"><a href="pfhostsedit.php?id=<?php print $pfhost['id'];?>">edit</a></td>
00086     <td class="edit" nowrap="nowrap"><a href="<?php print  $_SERVER['PHP_SELF']. "?del=". $pfhost['id'];?>" onclick="return confirm('Are you sure you want to delete this pfhost?')">delete</a></td>    
00087   </tr>
00088 
00089 <?php } ?>

00091 </tbody>
